titles.title: I Am Resolved (Palmer Hartsough; rev. Beth Weaver)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will come to Him quickly, come to Him glad and free, Jesus, greatest and highest, I will come to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will come to Him quickly, come to Him glad and free, Jesus, greatest and highest, I will come to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will come to Him quickly, come to Him glad and free, Jesus, greatest and highest, I will come to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will come to Him quickly, come to Him glad and free, Jesus, greatest and highest, I will come to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am resolved, and who will go with me? Come, now, without delay. Taught by the Bible, led by the Spirit, We’ll walk the heav’nly way. 10. I will come to Him quickly, come to Him glad and free, Jesus, greatest and highest, I will come to Thee.{/lang-eng}
